title: Persecution for religion judg'd and condemned in a discourse between an antichristian and a Christian : proving by the law of God and of the land, and by King James his many testimonies, that no man ought to be persecuted for his religion, so he testifie his allegiance by the oath appointed by law.
author: Helveys, Thomas, 1550?-1616?
publisher: Printed in the years 1615 and 1620 and now reprinted for the establishing some and convincing others,
